title: League Game Crashes?
body:
Hey,

Ever since the most recent patch, I've been getting the occasional crash in game. The screen just locks up -- and then either shuts itself down after some seconds, or I'm forced to kill it with the task manager. It's frequent enough to be a bother. Perhaps once every three games.

I don't suppose anyone else has experienced something similar, or has any solutions?

For reference, here's my machine:

Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit
AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core Processor
16 GB DDR 4 Ram
Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti

I've already tried a full game repair, and no go on that one.
